ygData.subject: Re: third tinkering book
ygData.msgSnippet: ... No no NO!  Gnomes are the only ones that can tinker, period.  That s why they have such ugly stats, and that Erudites make better casters, period. It s all
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Russ Gresh" <lordgrunk@...>
>
>animated bait works just like regular bait, maybe it increases your chances
>of catching something but I'm not sure because I'm a master fisherman
>anyway. and I'm pretty sure that anyone can tinker, gnomes just start out
>with some skill in it.
>
>Fixer gnomish enchanter

No no NO! Gnomes are the only ones that can tinker, period. That's why
they have such ugly stats, and that Erudites make better casters, period.
It's all a balance issue.

>
>
